findings.title: Violation of Check_Effects_Interaction Pattern in the Withdraw function
findings.description: The Shop contract updates state variables after making an external call, violating the Check Effects Interaction pattern.

findings.title: Redundant function trigger could be avoided in changeStatus() function
findings.description: The changeStatus() function doesn't validate whether or not the boolean value being passed as the status of the item is already assigned to the item, which can lead to redundant transactions.
